welcome_benefits: 100% Cashback Up to ₹300 on First Utility Bill Payment

Movie & Dining: You get 10% off on booking movie tickets on BookMyShow and 40% off food delivery while ordering with Zomato.
Rewards Rate: 1 EDGE REWARD Point/₹200 on All Eligible Spends (Reward Rate 0.10%)
Reward Redemption: The Edge Rewards can be redeemed against an array of categories at the Edge Rewards Website at a rate of 1 Edge RP = Re. 0.20.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived at all petrol pumps across India on transactions between Rs. 400 - Rs. 4000.

product_details: 1 EDGE REWARD point on every Rs. 200 spent on this card.
Reward Points are redeemable against over 500 options.
Get 40% off on Zomato food delivery with an Axis Bank Neo Credit Card.
Get 15% off on dining at partner restaurants.
Get 10% off on Blinkit, Myntra, and BookMyShow.
1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations in India.
